abstract: Israeli police say Abed el-Muhsen Hassuna, Palestinian resident of East Jerusalem, rammed car into number of Israelis gathered at bus stop, injuring around dozen.
lead_paragraph: About a dozen people were injured and the attacker, a 21-year-old resident of East Jerusalem, was fatally shot before he exited his vehicle, the police said.

headline.main: Palestinian Rams Car Into Crowd of Israelis at Jerusalem Bus Stop
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Israel: Palestinian Assaults Crowd

snippet: About a dozen people were injured and the attacker, a 21-year-old resident of East Jerusalem, was fatally shot before he exited his vehicle, the police said.
